articles.title: Google Maps will rename Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America in US - BBC.com
articles.description: It is the firm's "longstanding practice" to observe updates from official sources - in this case requested by Donald Trump.
articles.content: Google will change the name of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America in its Google Maps app, the company has said, after US President Donald Trump ordered that the body of water be renamed in US … [+2594 chars]
